archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.3.9: A file or database register should be established containing details of all authorised user and service accounts (including name, role, department, User ID, purpose, permissions, date granted, date last reviewed), which is:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
